originalText.text: I'm grateful that I made the decision to choose crystal cleaners. They were on time. The the worker was very excellent, very attentive. Very thorough cleaning, it was a dream. Come true, thank you so much for the staff and for Justin. Thank you so much for all your hard work. I will be calling you. And I recommend you to everyone.

text.text: I'm grateful that I made the decision to choose crystal cleaners. They were on time. The the worker was very excellent, very attentive. Very thorough cleaning, it was a dream. originalText.text:
These people ship the dry cleaning off to a factory and do not do it themselves.

I gave them two shirts on a Saturday and needed it by Wednesday for a work trip. Called in Tuesday to see where the shirts were and they said they weren't ready. I said that's fine, but I still need to pick them up regardless of if they're finished or not. I was told that I couldn't do that because they don't have them and they're at a factory. Will never ever go to them again

originalText.text:
I love these guys.  For Tailoring.  I've never gotten my laundry or drop-off done here, so I can't speak to that. But their tailoring is excellent, and CHEAP.  I'm talking half the prices of other places.  To hem a pair of pants.  They can do all the same stuff, like keep the original bottom of the hem if you want.  I went in once and even asked if I can have it back in a few hours and she said yes - no additional charge (don't expect that always of course, but that was a nice one-off).

This is not the fanciest tailor by any stretch of the imagination, but they do a great job, at a great price and with a friendly smile.  Thanks guys!

originalText.text: Inflated prices, shoddy alterations, irresponsible owner. Charged me $22 to wash a blanket, and $20 to alter the waist on a pair of pants by 1.5 inches. Alteration was done incorrectly, and all the owner said was “I’m so sorry, bye bye”

text.text: Inflated prices, shoddy alterations, irresponsible owner. Charged me $22 to wash a blanket, and $20 to alter the waist on a pair of pants by 1.5 inches. Alteration was done incorrectly, and all the owner said was “I’m so sorry, bye bye”

originalText.text: I’ve come here for wash & fold, dry cleaning, and tailoring. They’re fast, friendly, and good at what they do. I’ve used them probably 30+ times without any issues.
